name: Rise for the Fight
description:
Rise for the Fight is an upcoming Cartoon Multiplayer FPS game being developed by Reece Hayden.

Rise for the Fight's core gameplay is all about guns and damage. Deal damage to upgrade your gun's rate of fire and magazine capacity, but watch out because...


if you die, your gun stats reset...

Are you ready to fight?



Features:

- Expansive and Expressive Character Customization, with more coming in the future.
- Unique Twists to Classic Game Modes.
- 5 Simple yet Unique Maps, with more coming in the future.
- Over 10 Different Guns to play with.
- Using Photon PUN 2 Networking.

Controls (KEYBOARD AND MOUSE):
- WASD = Move
- Left Shift + WASD = Sprint
- Left Click = Shoot
- Right Click = Aim
- R = Reload
- G = Upgrade Gun Stats
- H = Heal
- Left CTRL = Compact (CROUCH)
- Esc + L = Leave Game
- 1/2 = Change Setting Values and Change Gun Upgrade Type.

Controls (XBOX):

- Left Joystick = Move
- A = Jump
- B = Heal
- Y = Upgrade Gun
- X = Reload
- RT = Shoot
- LT = Aim
- Left Joystick (PRESS/HOLD) = Sprint
- Right Joystick (PRESS/HOLD) = Crouch
- Select + Start = Leave Game
- LB/RB = Change Setting Values and Change Gun Upgrade Type.

Notes:

- This game's servers are set to US East, so if you are in a different region, you may experience high ping.

- This game's servers can only hold up to 100 Active Players at one time currently. This has been expanded from 20 to 100 for the Alpha, and will be extended if needed later on.

- There may be several bugs in the game, as it's in early development.



If you come across any issues with the game, please submit feedback in the comments on what can be improved.



Have Fun!
-Reece
